fields.name: Symbols:
fields.value: Target a living player. If they are evil, you are told their role and this ability instead targets a random living Town player. You choose an emoji, and can choose 1 more for each 20% of effective score you got last round. You also create a number of questions equal to the number of emojis minus one. The living player will choose an emoji to “react” to each message.

fields.name: Connection (Locked, x1):
fields.value: This ability is unlocked if you place first. Target a living player. For the next Day Phase, they can speak in the dead chat.
